lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I don't need the money

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Cristine
lenders.loan_because: We can make a difference for a better world, one dollar at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I resolve peoples problems by selling auto parts overseas.

lenders.name: Jay & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: In our hearts we want to change the world, from the inside out.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work for Canadian companies.  Lisa works for a large Canadian organization called Canadian Tire, where she helps design stores that customers shop in.  Jay works in a marketing company that works on and develops commercials and videos.

lenders.name: Altis
lenders.loan_because: thankfully I can.  I have been blessed and am able to afford helping someone else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Spanish teacher who makes jewlery to make a little extra money.  It's with that money that I want to loan to Kiva participants.

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. I am self employed and know what its like to try and do business. These ppl don't ask for donations, they are asking for loans ! If one defaults (which isn't likely), it won't break me. Philanthropy is a way of life, it makes you feel just a bit better about yourself. Try it ! I want to teach my children how lucky we are to live in a great country and how good it is to share with ppl less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Too complicated, but I service the automotive, aerospace and machining industry.

lenders.name: Albert & Lorna
lenders.loan_because: Jesus called us to minister to "the least of these."  To whom much is given, much is required.  We are simply passing the blessing along.

lenders.name: Marion, Rinia and Lex
lenders.loan_because: We feel deeply touched by and connected with the people we lend to.  Kiva opens a unique window on the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all retired; Marion spends a lot of time with the grandchildren (4 - 13 years old).  They have chickens and a vegetable and flower garden.  Marion and Lex volunteer in church and in a nearby park.  Lex writes a book on trees in Liberia (West Africa).  Rinia is supporting old friends with health issues.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: People deserve a chance.  I have been given many, and it's time to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to make cars and trucks attractive to look at and safe to drive.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: Kivo provides me an opportunity to circulate the abundance with which I have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Through coaching, I inspire others to live authentically, to achieve principled success and to make a positive difference in the world. I aim to live by my motto, "Discover who you are. Decide what's important.  Do what matters."  Lending to Kivo matters to me.

lenders.name: Beth and Grant
lenders.loan_because: we're fortunate and we want to share our good fortune

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into an environment where I am able to accrue surplus capitol.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a natural penchant for empathy...

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life, I feel it's only right to help those who have not been so fortunate.

lenders.name: Françoise
lenders.loan_because:
my employer gave us the $25.00
 for the cause, and I learn about it 
 in Today on NBC. I think it's a very 
 terrific idea.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is framing arts, photos,
 needleworks, posters, and every-
 things you can imaging. I have been
 doing it for 21 years.

lenders.name: Tres Putas
lenders.loan_because: I loan to help others succeed.

lenders.name: M & T
lenders.loan_because: We want to change the world!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am greatful for all my blessings and think it is important to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their lives through investment in real estate.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I like making other people happy.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It is the most worthwhile thing I can think of to do with my money. $25 could take me out to lunch, or it could help take someone out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the executive office of a Planned Parenthood affiliate, raising money and awareness to ensure that women will always have access to safe, responsible reproductive health care.

lenders.name: preeti
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a US bank managing its risk.

lenders.name: LaKeisha
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Africa and know the economic hardship of both men and women. I also feel that as a African American, it is my responsibility to help Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach literature at a college.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.occupation: mother of two and church organist

lenders.loan_because: I can help.

lenders.occupation: teacher-but at home now with my 2 small children

lenders.loan_because: I can. It is the right thing to do. I know that one person can make a difference.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.occupational_info: lawyer for a movie studio.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: There are many good people that deserve a chance. A small loan is a simple place to start.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: Our connections with other people are the source of true richness in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I create the plans and concepts for video games made by computer programmers and artists. I'm currently working with GoPets.net and on a game that helps teach nutrition to kids.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and the positive effects it can have on individual lives and the communities they are a part of.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales manager for a national bedding retailer. I manage my own store and I also train new employees.

lenders.name: Clay Alexander

lenders.occupational_info: As a Chemical Engineer, I apply the principles of chemistry to solve problems in manufacturing. I also promote awareness in chemical manufacturing and chemical safety.

lenders.name: DK!
lenders.loan_because: I could waste the money on junk food, video games, gambling, or any other vice...or someone else can use it to improve their way of life.  The latter sounds better.

lenders.name: Beau
lenders.loan_because: I love that Kiva empowers people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Paramedic in an Australian ambulance service.

lenders.name: Paula Kivafriends.org
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to an individual.  Sometimes all it takes is someone to give you a chance to make your life better for yourself and your family.  I want to be able to provide someone with that chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a technical consultant for a computer firm.  The company I work for designs, installs and support computer networks for businesses around New Zealand.

lenders.name: Adriano Esposito
lenders.loan_because:
The international aids from governments cannot go to people as well as the aid provided by Kiva and its partners. And I think we inhabitants of the so-called civilized world have a duty, and an opportunity, to help those who, despite their bad leaders, want to improve his condition and those of the country where he lives.
It 'a great opportunity for everyone!
lenders.occupational_info: I program and manage information systems

lenders.occupational_info: I am a video editor, cameraman, producer, evs operator, technical...you know!! Working in a small audiovisual company you need to be prepared to do everything!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: giving people a hand up, not a hand out, just makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I give advice to people about how to improve their businesses.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I like to visit developing nations, and I have often wondered how can I help those people that are so determined in a nation of limited opportunity. Kiva shows that they play a part in the answer to help these people that WILL succeed. I wanted to be a part of that.
lenders.occupational_info:
My fitness regime demands dedication, strength and confidence.
As a personal trainer I need to be creative, enthusiastic and knowledgeable about healthy lifestyle.

lenders.loan_because: It can make a difference... the motivaton and determination are already there, together we can help overcome that last hurdle.

Go HOKIES!!!

lenders.occupational_info: Online marketing, web development.

lenders.loan_because: Our sociology class is investing with Kiva to learn about  and participate in social change, social movements, social action, and micro-financing. This class project provides a global perspective to our studies.

lenders.loan_because: it's kind of fun

lenders.loan_because: i enjoy helping people that try to better themselves through hard work.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I want the world I grow up in to still be a good place when I grow up. We have to start giving something back if we want anything to be left for my generation.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't work yet, but I go to school everyday to learn and play. I love my family and my dog.

lenders.name: Soledad
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact and my aim is to make a loan to someone in every country I've visited.

lenders.name: Badi, Candace
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to

lenders.name: Wynne
lenders.loan_because: I have struggled at times in my life, and have gotten help from friends. I'm now fortunate enough to be able to give a little back.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I send people around the world on vacation, hopefully to learn something new about a culture they've never encountered.  In doing so I believe we will all be better humans, compassionate, caring and understanding.

lenders.name: Nancie
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business on your own.  Everyone needs a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for large corporations for many years, then I started my own business.  Now I am retired.

lenders.name: Hal & Tracy
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy working as small business people. Giving others in other parts of the world a chance is very rewarding.

lenders.name: Bert
lenders.occupational_info: I help start businesses.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: My mother always told me to give back as I climb the ladder of success.  She was right. I find it to be one of the greatest joys in life.  I will do this as long as I am financially, physically and spiritually capable.
lenders.occupational_info: doctor of medicine.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: The old saying about giving a fishing rod instead of a fish is the only solution for sustainable improvement.
lenders.occupational_info: I create printed materials for an excellent university that serves U.S. and international students to make a better world.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Over the course of my career, I've visited countries all over the world including Congo, Kazakhstan and North Korea. I've seen devastating poverty first hand. I believe that microfinance loans can empower enterprising individuals to improve their situations and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the nuclear industry, packaging and transporting radioactive material around the world.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: It is the spirit of community, one of us helping the other that will bring us the change we want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people communicate their business to others.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help empower women to care for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am raising my babies.

lenders.name: Tedfred
lenders.loan_because: To aid those in need while being able to reloan the monies recieved
lenders.occupational_info: Theatrical lighting designer. lighting plays for live audiences and teaching students how to do it.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a Rock Band in the Colorado area. it's called Shallow Man Down. I believe that my voice can make changes in the world I live in. This is putting money where my mouth is.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: It's easy to make a buck. It's harder to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell real estate. What I buy makes me money. I share my profits.

lenders.name: lola
lenders.loan_because: regretfully I am withdrawing my Kiva lending as I feel Kiva no longer focuses on true MicroFinance which is my core interest.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: These funds were given to me by my father and mother in law.  They were given as a "Gift of Giving".  They've encouraged me to help make the world a better place for everyone, even if it's a little at a time.  If I can help someone with this loan to better themselves and their family, to live happier and healthier, it would be a fantastic gift to me and to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant.  I keep records for all sorts of companies; hospital, construction, architects, rental properties.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am able to. I am sure that most people in need much prefer assistance in helping themselves than simply receiving a charity hand-out.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something meaningful  for others.

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.occupational_info: I help homeless people at a Christian shelter.  I am a supervisor of the Women's Ministry.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: office work

lenders.name: Ernest

lenders.loan_because:
I know how hard it is to start a business

so that they can help their children and  their communities.

Art & Science of Herbalism.  I grow, harvest, process and create herbal remedies & nutritional products.  It is one of my many "dreams come true".

lenders.loan_because: The desire to do good.

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I can afford a small amount to make a difference in someone's life, family and community.

lenders.name: Greg

lenders.occupational_info: I write about single parenting so that other single parents feel less alone, and so that people who aren't single parents will understand our unique strengths and challenges.

lenders.name: Diane & Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We are honored to assist others with a loan which enables them to help themselves & their families.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.occupation: Life Coach, Breath Coach, Sexological Bodyworker,
lenders.loan_because: it's a small effort that makes a BIG difference!

lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference

lenders.name: gayle
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: giving helps us all grow

lenders.name: Sam, Zac, Kathy & Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe ending extreme poverty will alleviate many of the worlds other problems. Defeating poverty allows for better education which allows for a better person and so on...
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a University by managing funds paid by students to purchase technology equipment such as computers and software.

lenders.name: Sanjeev
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to have had the opportunity to study up through post - grad, learning from great teacher's, personal experiences, and my family.  Now I have a new opportunity, one which allows me to think more of others by creating new opportunities for hardworking people.
lenders.occupational_info:

Now I am in Sales and Marketing at a leading worldwide software companies.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others if I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I write articles for newspapers and magazines.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and would like to reach out and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the health care field solving computer issues.

lenders.name: Darci
lenders.loan_because: Because when in a capable position it is my responsibility to help others who are less fortunate than me. The fact alone that they are trying to better themselves and their families makes me want to help them reach their worthy goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a bank giving new businesses loans to help improve their business.

lenders.name: Conan
lenders.loan_because: My Aunt Terry is a wonderful, thoughtful person.
lenders.occupational_info: I carry pizza to tables. Then people eat it. Then, I clean their plates.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to Uganda and know what kinds of conditions people are living in and trying to get out of. lenders.name: Sione
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to the point that I am able to... because if we all put out just a slight effort to help, the compounded results will be astounding.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just trying to do a bit more good than bad and "pay back" a little of all I've been given.

lenders.name: Jasmine
lenders.loan_because: being able to help make a difference around the world is the best gift I've ever recieved.

lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurial independence can change the world.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I design buildings such as shops, houses, and schools.

lenders.name: Sarah

lenders.occupational_info: clinical research data

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Because I can and it is a little thing that could help a lot
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs that tell computers what to do ... basically I am a problem solver

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should.  Rather than give your money to a "charity" where you are then cut off from your funds, with no knowledge of how they are used and distributed and never knowing who is truly benefiting from your contribution.  Plus it is a hand up rather than a hand out.  Give a man a fish or teach him to fish, I would choose to teach and empower rather than give and enslave.
lenders.occupational_info: Development of web sites for small business and non-profit organizations. Also computer tech support for small business, non-profits, and individuals.

lenders.name: Regen Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to treat others as we want to be treated.
lenders.occupational_info: We are working on the Gulf Coast of Mississippi

lenders.name: Jody + Kevin
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I drive tractor trailer long-haul across  Canada and US

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: Not ..., "Watt's in for Me" !
lenders.occupational_info: co-worker at a Network Operation Centre of a small cable company for RTV, Internet and Phone

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I've spent a lot of money on stupid things in the past that never had an impact on someone's life.  I figured it was time to make a change.  I'm in business for myself and nothing matches the sense of freedom like owning your own business.

lenders.name: Darcy

lenders.occupational_info: I taught elementary school for 31 years.  Now I am a fiber artist.

lenders.name: Matt

lenders.name: Kelly

lenders.name: Greysen

lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we need a more equal global distribution of wealth.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
$= POWER
I want to give people power to make changes.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: When I needed help others helped. God has blessed me with resources to help others and it feels so good to know a little money goes a long long way.

lenders.name: Fatima
lenders.loan_because: I am involved in an entrepreneurial venture myself and want to support the spirit of entrepreneurship worldwide
lenders.occupational_info: Creating a platform to assist people in improving the quality of their lives

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
I feel everyone should have access to the tools and resources to live a better quality of life whether that is through education, food and/or the basic necessities for their family, a better home, or a stronger business which would help them and their community.

If my loan will help someone achieve their goals, then I will gladly assist them in whatever way I can.

It is our responsibility to help those less fortunate.


.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant.

lenders.name: MKMC
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone who can, should.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web applications that look very boring but are very useful to my customers.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should help as they can because we are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: i do medical research helping to improve everyone's lives in other ways

lenders.name: Lorraine & Robert
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is a good feeling knowing you are helping someone in need.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I think that the idea of microcredit is brilliant!  It shows how relatively small amounts of money can really change the lives of so many people.  It is a wonderful feeling to be able to help someone who lives across the world and to know that whatever amount I am able to donate will really make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: i know how difficult it is to get enough capital to start your own business
lenders.occupational_info: im a professional cook

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Nicole & Cam
lenders.loan_because: we know how nice it is to have help starting a business :)
lenders.occupational_info: we are just trying to nourish people, environment, and community the way it was intended... in balance and harmony with nature

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: there's really no reason not to.  I like feeling like I can help someone better their life.

lenders.name: Vicky
lenders.loan_because: Travel has made me aware of how fortunate I am. This is a simple and effective way to give something back

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I am a Christian and Jesus said to share our blessings.

lenders.name: Sally - Mpls. MN, USA
lenders.loan_because: I owe my job of 24 years to a small business entrepreneur.  I'm happy for the opportunity to help a budding entrepreneur better their own circumstances and their community in the process.
lenders.occupational_info: Hire and coach employees that work for the business owner.  Oversee all aspects of the employment relationship.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the world

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: This allows my money to help others looking to improve their lot and then allows my money to do it all again as it is repaid.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people that have the initiative to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in massage and physical therapy.  I get to help people daily who have injuries and diseases that impact the physical movement of their bodies.  It's very rewarding work.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am co-owner of a web development company that provides tools for small to medium businesses such as myself.

lenders.name: Kayla
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want other entrepreneurs to bring new and innovative ideas to the world market.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I want to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on crews that produce feature films, television shows and commercials.

lenders.name: Shari-Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I wanted a way to help people directly, not through a company that has high overhead.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan events at companies, offering flu shots, cholesterol testing and blood pressure tests. I was involved in an accident and must work from home so this is a perfect position for me!

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help other people. These loans will help them achieve greater success now and in the future
lenders.occupational_info: As an office manager I am responsible for making sure all orders to our customers and vendors are handled along with making sure all the bills are paid in a timely manner.  I make sure any and all shipping is done and handle any and all issues that arise

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people get on their feet and thrive!
lenders.occupational_info: I homeschool my children and we volunteer in the community. I also open the Bible and pray with women.

lenders.name: Judy & Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a positive impact for others in the world and encourage people to succeed.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I care.  As a woman who started her own business, I know how hard it can be even in the best of circumstances.  I want these women to realize their full potential, to achieve success and independence and to be able to provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I feel very fortunate to be able to stay home wth my daughters right now.  I hope to demonstrate to them that helping others is vital in achieving true happiness in life.  Giving IS the gift.  If we all work together, we CAN make this world a better, safer place for the next generation.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: Giving to others feels great!

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: it is the best thing i can do in my current situation
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor for animals

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to express my gratitude for blessings
lenders.occupational_info: volunteer

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that the small amount of money that I contribute can be added to other contributions to help improve the life of another person.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a seed and plant company and enjoy my work very much.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I loan because i can. It makes me feel good to help others in need.

lenders.name: Scott & Kam
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to...

lenders.name: Doug and Inmi
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we have been blessed by the Lord and want to share the opportunity that He has given us to help our brothers and sisters around the world in need.

lenders.name: Curt Shontz
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans help people to help themselves. It's really a no-brainer!
lenders.occupational_info: I draw and paint pictures that help the reader of a story see with their eyes what the writer is describing with words.

lenders.name: Marcella
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with a great family, job, home, etc. and want to help others make their dreams become a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of the company permit and license requirements.

lenders.name: Christiane
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled at the opportunity to help someone start a business and change their circumstances.

lenders.name: Aye
lenders.loan_because: The idea of these entrepeneurs taking an active role in changing their lives appeals to me.  They're creating a better future for themselves and whoever else depends on them.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an academic program manager for a public university in the San Francisco Bay Area.  I help students in my program with class registration and nearly everything else related to their academic life.  Since the program I manage is completely online, it's wonderful when we get students who live overseas and complete our program from their home country.

lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have family and friends who could and would support me if I needed help.  I want to create opportunities for those who are without a financial lifeline.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Green Building Council, which has a mission "To transform the way buildings and communities are designed, built and operated, enabling an environmentally and socially responsible, healthy, and prosperous environment that improves the quality of life." I recently obtained a Master of City Planning degree.

lenders.name: Frederick
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to be born in Canada. I was lucky to be born in a good family. I was lucky to travel enough in this world to see that it is not everyone's case.
lenders.occupational_info: I design electronic equipment for factories.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: We're all floating on the same giant boat.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major non-profit organization developing and supporting custom software.  I hope I can give back and help those who need it, and that they, in turn, can help others.  I hope we can all start a vicious cycle with non-vicious results.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is an awesome idea. I've had loans throughout my life to help me: car, school, and more.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: It's something I can do to help others that are far away to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big box store.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make women around the world entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Many of us are teachers.  We are all women with children and wish you a successful business.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I see an amazing amount of leverage in these loans!

lenders.name: eline
lenders.loan_because: To show the love of Christ

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.loan_because: "Do the best you can, with what you have, from where you are"

lenders.name: Magnus Wolfe Murray
lenders.loan_because: I have learned that micro credit really works.  Because I can have a direct link with the people accessing the loan, and they can see me and the other lenders.  This is a great system.  Everyone should use it.
lenders.occupational_info: For 14 years I was a humanitarian aid worker, mostly working in conflict or post-disaster areas (Bosnia 92-98, Kosovo, Albania, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan, Eritrea, Burundi, Liberia, Indonesia, Maldives).  In 2006 I decided to start a degree to learn about renewable energy and sustainable construction (because the aid sector rebuilds SO many houses but almost never uses these designs and technologies).  Then I helped found an NGO to help spread this information. It's called RESET (renewable energy shelter environment training)

lenders.name: Chau Nguyen
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: going to college to better myself and others

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I Work nights from 12am to 7am at a Gas Station..I'm a cashier and night manager..i make sure everything is ready for the next day of business.

lenders.name: Alejandro
lenders.loan_because: I believe that individual entrepreneurs in any country are the best contributors to economic development, thus I want to support them to promote global prosperity
lenders.occupational_info: I train health care professionals in the treatment of pain and musculoskeletal problems using electroacupuncture and manual techniques

lenders.name: Greenacarina
lenders.loan_because: It is needed and I love to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a retail store 40 hours a week and do various work on the side to make ends meet

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Investing in the entrepreneurial spirit is the best way to improve the world.

lenders.name: Gerard
lenders.loan_because: I can make a big impact with a small loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Kiva!

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: Just lending a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Classified

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to try and affect as many people as possible in as positive a way as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and I make jewelry for a living.

lenders.name: Sherry and Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to give an opportunity for others to better themselves and that of their family.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: I hope it can help motivate others to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: An impatient optimist working to fulfill a core belief that every life has equal value – that every person gets the chance to live a healthy, productive life.

lenders.name: Luana
lenders.occupational_info: Work with Indigenous community groups

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: Its a sensible way for ordinary people to to help alleviate poverty by support ing people who want to improve their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in developing social benefits to peoples involved in environment protection

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupation: Retired. The photo is that of an inukshuk.
lenders.loan_because:
A good friend "invited" me to visit Kiva.org and make a loan. Also, I recalled that Muhammad Yunus won the Nobel Peace Prize in 2006 for his microloan project.
I am impressed by the entrepeneurial spirit of the people, especially women, in developing nations. Although I have not put a great deal of new money into the program, I re-loan as soon as I have $25 in my account.
lenders.occupational_info: I worry a lot about the plight of women worldwide, especially the atrocities visited upon them by the males of the species.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupation: Director of Marketing for Senior Retirement Center

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.occupational_info: I do the morning milking of 150 +/- Holstein cows, take care of any health problems, feet trimming, etc. I also feed and look after calves, replacement heifers, and steers on the farm. In the process I operate tractors, loaders, and other equipment. I also raise and train dogs to help me with my work, they're very handy when I need to gather cattle from a pasture or sort and move cattle.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a way to make a real difference in the lives of people who are really trying to make "it" work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the senior priest in a church (Episcopal/ Anglican) in Savannah, Georgia USA.

lenders.name: Julie & James
lenders.occupation: Clinical Research Assoc. / Service Trng Coord.
lenders.loan_because: It always feels better to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Jet-setter/road warrior

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is the best way to improve the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform maintenance and repair of helicopters, own gift store and conduct meetings of self awareness and improvement /developement

lenders.name: boby
lenders.loan_because: i want to help

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. My family and I enjoy a good life and we would like to share this with those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I design the  lighting of new construction projects, and the re-imaging of established developments.

lenders.name: Carolina & Marco
lenders.loan_because: We believe that big changes start with small steps.

lenders.name: Harper and Cleo
lenders.loan_because: We can and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Sleeping, eating, barking, and playing.

lenders.name: Sara & Eric
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand from time to time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college and work for NASA playing with money all day.  It sounds much more exciting than it really is.  :)

lenders.name: Monelle
lenders.loan_because: It is a privilege and a pleasure to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day, working for my daughter's wholesale costume jewelry business.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Empowering others to better the lives of their familys makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies unlock their hidden potential.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people!

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.occupation: Project Coordinator for a CBSM company

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing I can give a hand up to someone working hard to start thier own business! I know what a challenge it was to start mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people of all walks of life to get the shelter that they need. Whether it is buying or renting, or helping the homeless, there is a way to make a match!

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I need to believe they would do the same for me if roles were reversed.  Also, because it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I believe empowerment isn't just life-altering, but world-changing.
lenders.occupational_info: I create loan documents for a bank. I am also working on a Masters degree in International Business, and I am a professional photographer on the side.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to see what kind of an impact I can have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the energy industry managing a program that provides services to commercial customers.

lenders.name: Nedra & kids
lenders.loan_because: of my desire to be charitable on a global level and instill hope in those who seek to better themselves. Basically, to show the love of Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the business of educating children.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: Love to help

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I need to help other people.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I have had a most fortunate life, and I would like to help someone have a better life.  We should all be able to live and work and make positive contributions to the world.  I believe in helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of 7 year old children.  Living in California, I typically have a classroom with 24 children during the school year.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.occupational_info: I go and I learn about things...

lenders.name: Vijay Medithi
lenders.loan_because: It contributes in a minute way to empower others to work towards their financial freedom. And the transparency is unparalell.

lenders.name: Kathi and Terry
lenders.loan_because: We had been looking for a long time to find something we could do to share our good fortune.  Kiva was just the answer and we're excited to be able to start sharing in this venture.
lenders.occupational_info:
Kathi is a retired teacher.  She taught music to elementary school children.  She has taught music to children in Australia, Africa, and Japan.  She also sings in community choirs, helps with children's choirs, and makes music a big part of her life.
Terry was an instructional aide at the local community college and is also a freelance graphic designer.  He now writes and self-publishes his own books, and is an avid bird watcher and photographer.

lenders.name: Ana e Carlos
lenders.loan_because: We are all in the same boat

lenders.name: KEVIN CARROLL
lenders.loan_because: "to whom much is given, much is expected"
lenders.occupational_info: Author, Speaker, and an Agent for social Change

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
I am an entrepreneur and know how hard it is to start up a new business.
If I can help someone get started and make their dreams come true to provide for themselves and their families, its my small way to assist.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a co-owner of a gourmet cookie and brownie gift company.  
We ship our products all over the US. Our job is to send a smile in a box. :-)

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to lIve in the United States. How did that happen and why?
lenders.occupational_info: I train maintenance people who work on high technology sorting machines for the United States Postal Service

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people...
lenders.occupational_info: I manage commercial construction projects...

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, to change their situation themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people develope their internet buisness.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: When God blesses us with plenty, he expects us to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: I do volunteer work for various community agencies, including teaching English to refugees.

lenders.name: Marsha
lenders.loan_because: I have so much. I enjoy being able to help others.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Altruism is not solely a domain of the religious.
lenders.occupational_info: I get paid to understand and discover things and then explain them to other people, who use that knowledge to save lives.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I think that everyone should have an equal amount of fun and enjoyment  in their life.  I know a lot of people work hard for  it and it's fun for me to be able to help them achieve!
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and participate in athletics and other clubs and organizations!

lenders.name: Kyle & Sara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone is worthy.
lenders.occupational_info: Sara is a wedding and event planner, so she gets to help people celebrate different events in their lives with people they love.  Kyle works for a local church and is resposible for creating and running services using modern, creative methods to meet seekers where they are.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Latifa-Therese
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me in times of trouble
lenders.occupational_info: helping families in crisis

lenders.name: Kari-Lynn
lenders.occupational_info: I study economics at the University of Chicago.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: People deserve a chance.

lenders.name: Michael & Vivian
lenders.loan_because: We are inspired by those who strive to make their lives better by working hard.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in personal empowerment. Once a loan is repaid, the money can be applied to another lender, creating a sustainable cycle.

 As a freelance artist, I have been given opportunities that allowed me to realize my dream. I want to help create opportunities for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work independently as a painter. My goal is to make a living doing what I love and inspire others to do the same!

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: i am already in debt anyway!

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I really have nothing better to do with my money.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: i got too much cash

lenders.name: Aisha
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference, one person at a time.  I'm just grateful for what I have and trying to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a New York State government office that maintains New York State highways.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and support programs to help people be more effective at their jobs.

lenders.name: Amanda & Nick
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because we believe in supporting women entrepreneurs. 

"To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own."
- Anne Morrow Lindbergh, Writer & Aviation Pioneer
lenders.occupational_info: Nick is studying to be a Dentist, and Amanda works in Sales.
